question.content:
In this assignment, let's build a Features Section by applying the concepts we learned till now. **Refer to the below images.** The following images illustrate all device sizes, from extra small to extra large. Extra Small (Size < 576px) and Small (Size >= 576px)

Medium (Size >= 768px), Large (Size >= 992px) and Extra Large (Size >= 1200px): Try to achieve the design as close as possible.
#### Resources Use the image URLs given below. - [https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-1-img.png](https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-1-img.png) - [https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-2-img.png](https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-2-img.png) - [https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-3-img.png](https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-3-img.png) - [https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-4-img.png](https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-4-img.png) - [https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-5-img.png](https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-5-img.png) - [https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-6-img.png](https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/responsive-website/awsome-features-6-img.png)
**CSS Colors used:** Text color Hex Code values:
\#323f4b
\#7b8794
\#9aa5b1

**CSS Font families used:** - Roboto
#### Concepts Review Want to quickly review some of the concepts you’ve been learning? Take a look at the Cheat Sheets.

test_cases.display_text: Page should consist of an HTML container element with the bootstrap class name container
Page should consist of an HTML element with the bootstrap class name row in the HTML element with bootstrap class name container
Page should consist of HTML heading element in the HTML container element with the bootstrap class name row
Page should consist of at least seven HTML paragraph elements in the HTML container element with class name row
Page should consist of at least six HTML container elements with the bootstrap class name col-md-6 in the HTML element with bootstrap class name row
Page should consist of at least six HTML elements with the bootstrap class name d-flex in the HTML element with class name row
Page should consist of at least six HTML elements with the bootstrap class name flex-row in the HTML element with class name row
Page should consist of at least six HTML image elements in HTML container element with class name row
test_cases.criteria: function isDivContainsImages() {  assert.isAbove($('#htmlPreview .container .row').find('img').toArray().filter(( element, index )=>$(element).attr("src") !== undefined && $(element).attr("src") !== "").length, 5);  }isDivContainsImages();

html_coding_question_details.code_content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.5.2/css/bootstrap.min.css" integrity="sha384-JcKb8q3iqJ61gNV9KGb8thSsNjpSL0n8PARn9HuZOnIxN0hoP+VmmDGMN5t9UJ0Z" crossorigin="anonymous" />
    <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.5.1.slim.min.js" integrity="sha384-DfXdz2htPH0lsSSs5nCTpuj/zy4C+OGpamoFVy38MVBnE+IbbVYUew  +OrCXaRkfj" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/popper.js@1.16.1/dist/umd/popper.min.js" integrity="sha384-9 reFTGAW83EW2RDu2S0VKaIzap3H66lZH81PoYlFhbGU+6BZp6G7niu735Sk7lN" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script src="https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.5.2/js/bootstrap.min.js" integrity="sha384-B4gt1jrGC7Jh4AgTPSdUtOBvfO8shuf57BaghqFfPlYxofvL8/KUEfYiJOMMV+rV" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
  </head>
  <body>
    Your code goes here
  </body>
</html>

description.content: An approach of designing a Features Section using Bootstrap.

code_details.code_content:
Features that make Design simply awesome

Not sure if Design is for you? Check out a few of the key features!

Vectors

Use SVGs that always stay crisp and you can change the color as you go.

Forms

Add forms to collect your visitors' emails directly with Mailchimp.

Effects

Add some fancy elements to your designs by adding interactive scroll effects or animations.

Paste CSS

Copy CSS from Photoshop or Sketch or even your text editor and paste it.

Responsive from the start

Have full control over mobile layouts. Move the breakpoints where it's best for the content.

Library

Choose from presets or create your collections of elements to re-use later in your projects.
